name: silbinarywolf/silverstripe-mrfilter
description: A filtering form API that's fully configurable in the CMS and has live front-end Google Map filtering.

suggest.silverstripe-australia/addressable: Allows retrieval of an addresses latitude/longitude via Google geocoding API
suggest.silverstripe/solr: Allows keyword searching in the filter and geospatial filtering based on users latitude and longitude.
